gov.va.vinci.leo

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.vinci.leo.tools.LeoProperties
      • gov.va.vinci.leo.Service

  • public class Service
extends LeoProperties
    This object will deploy a UIMA AS server from the list of primitive descriptor files provided by the caller. Any modules that will be executed must be in the classpath of the Service process, remote modules being the exception once those are implemented. Optionally the user can edit the standard properties file to modify the default settings for the UIMA pipeline execution.
    Author:
    thomasginter

      protected org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaAsynchronousEngine mUAEngine
      UIMA Asynchronous Engine object used to deploy the server and later to init and run the client side of the service also.

    • Method Detail

      • getAggregateDescriptorFile

        public String getAggregateDescriptorFile()
        Get the aggregate descriptor file path.
        Returns:
        the mAggregateDescriptorFile

      • deploy

        public void deploy(ArrayList<String> primitives,
                   boolean byName)
            throws Exception
        Create a deployment descriptor and initialize the mAppCtx and mUAEngine objects then call deploy to deploy the service.
        Parameters:
        primitives - ArrayList of primitive Analysis Engine descriptors
        byName - if true, it is assumed the list of primitives exists in the classpath. If false, full paths to the primitives is required.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs during deployment.

      • deploy

        public void deploy(List<LeoAEDescriptor> primitives)
            throws Exception
        Initialize a service pipeline by first generating an aggregate descriptor from a list of LeoAEDescriptor objects.
        Parameters:
        primitives - a list of primitive components to deploy as a service.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs during deployment.

      • deploy

        public void deploy(LeoTypeSystemDescription leoTypeSystemDescription,
                   LeoAnnotator... annotators)
            throws Exception
        Initialize a pipeline by generating the aggregate descriptor file from the list of LeoAnnotator objects then deploy it in the UIMA-AS framework.
        Parameters:
        leoTypeSystemDescription - the type system to add to each delegate.
        annotators - one or more annotators to deploy as a pipeline in the service.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs during deployment.

      • deploy

        public void deploy(LeoTypeSystemDescription leoTypeSystemDescription,
                   int numInstances,
                   LeoAnnotator... annotators)
            throws Exception
        Initialize a pipeline by generating the aggregate descriptor file from the list of LeoAnnotator objects then deploy it in the UIMA-AS framework.
        Parameters:
        leoTypeSystemDescription - the type system to add to each delegate.
        numInstances - number of pipeline instances to deploy.
        annotators - one or more annotators to deploy as a pipeline in the service.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs during deployment.

      • deploy

        public void deploy(List<LeoAnnotator> annotators,
                   int numInstances,
                   LeoTypeSystemDescription leoTypeSystemDescription)
            throws Exception
        Initialize a pipeline by generating the aggregate descriptor file from the list of LeoAnnotator objects then deploy it in the UIMA-AS framework.
        Parameters:
        annotators - list of annotators to deploy as a pipeline in the service.
        numInstances - number of pipeline instances to deploy.
        leoTypeSystemDescription - the type system to add to each delegate.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs during deployment.

        Use the AnalysisEngineDescription as input for the deployment descriptor that is generated.
        Parameters:

      • deploy

        public void deploy()
            throws Exception
        Initialize the mAppCtx and mUAEngine objects then deploy the service. Requires that a deployment descriptor file has already been set.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs during deployment.
